changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}control_role` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `control_id` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '资源控制标识', `unit_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '组织单元ID', `role_code` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '角色编码', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者', `updated_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后修改者', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uk_control_unit_role` (`control_id`, `unit_id`, `role_code`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT ='工作台-权限控制角色表';

changeSet.comment: 权限控制表删除唯一索引
